ygData.subject: RE: RE: Dueling (was: Yellow?!?)
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are in a PvP area in a duel, YES you can be attacked by other people.
ygData.messageBody:
If you are in a PvP area in a duel, YES you can be attacked by other
people.


> > 6. If you're dueling in a PVP area, can other people enter the fight?
>
> No, a duel is strictly one-on-one. If you're looking for a brawl, you
> can go to one of those PvP area and start fighting without issuing or
> accepting a duel.
>
>
